title: Configurable external website link in navigation and footer

requirements.summary: Add a configurable external website link (label + URL) to desktop primary navigation and the mobile menu, rendered only when configured and opened safely in a new tab.
acceptanceCriteria: A new external link is available in the primary navigation (desktop) and the mobile menu.
The external link opens in a new tab and uses safe link attributes (e.g., rel="noopener noreferrer").
The external website URL and label are configurable in the frontend (e.g., via a single config module and/or Vite env vars such as VITE_WEBSITE_URL and VITE_WEBSITE_LABEL).
If no website URL is configured, the external link is not rendered anywhere (no broken/placeholder link).
All user-facing text for this feature is in English (e.g., default label: "Website").

file_operations.description: Create a single configuration module that reads Vite env vars (VITE_WEBSITE_URL, VITE_WEBSITE_LABEL), applies an English default label ("Website"), and exposes a helper that returns a validated external link object only when the URL is present and safe (e.g., http/https); otherwise returns null.

Wire the configurable external website link into both desktop navigation and the mobile menu using the shared config helper; render it as an external anchor that opens in a new tab with rel="noopener noreferrer", and ensure it is not rendered anywhere when no valid URL is configured. Use existing shadcn-ui Button/Sheet patterns already present for consistent styling; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Add the same configurable external website link to the global footer next to existing attribution, shown only when configured and kept responsive.
acceptanceCriteria: The footer displays a "Website" link only when a valid external URL is configured.
Clicking the footer website link opens the configured URL in a new tab with rel="noopener noreferrer".
Footer layout remains responsive and visually consistent with the existing theme.

file_operations.description: Import and use the shared external website config helper to conditionally render a "Website" footer link alongside the existing caffeine.ai attribution; ensure the link opens in a new tab with rel="noopener noreferrer" and that the footer remains responsive and visually consistent (no placeholder when URL is missing).
